entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:25 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
